message.body: Not too burden you but right after he passed she hugged me and said "you know he was my everything." I can't stop thinking about it. I don't know how one recovers from this, it's unreal. Thanks for checking in. Huge hugs to you xo

Ugghhhh god. Yeah I keep trying to imagine something like that happening, I can't even think about it, and then I remember that it's happening for Leuwam & my heart cracks all over again. I am glad we're in it together though.Â
I know. She deserves every bit of it and more. Give mark a hug for me, i hate thinking about captain unflappable being sad! Xoxox to you too.
I just typed that and a lot more in a message to a few of you on the board, feel free to pass it around. You are one of her close friends (and I also adore you!) it's the least I can do.
